parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural

str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 1st Person Plural
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From apo and lambano; to receive; also to take aside.
